request.description:
Test Execution
- First set your email in following table.

select * from EMAILDBA.NOTIFY_EMAIL_CONFIG where company_id=97338

- Then set the DROP_DOWN_ERROR_IND='Y' in EMPINITDBA.AUTH_FORM_CONFIG table. Pass "relocationPolicy": "Test Policy" in the json.

update EMPINITDBA.AUTH_FORM_CONFIG set DROP_DOWN_ERROR_IND='Y' where AUTH_FORM_CONFIG_ID=10

- Then execute the API request.
- An email will be received which contains the failed initiation and reason of failure as 'List value does not exist -Authorization Rejected'.

request.description:
Test Execution
- First set your email in following table.

select * from EMAILDBA.NOTIFY_EMAIL_CONFIG where company_id=97338

- Then set the DROP_DOWN_ERROR_IND='N' in EMPINITDBA.AUTH_FORM_CONFIG table.

update EMPINITDBA.AUTH_FORM_CONFIG set DROP_DOWN_ERROR_IND='N' where AUTH_FORM_CONFIG_ID=10

- Then execute the API request.
- An email will be received which contains the failed initiation and reason of failure as 'List value does not exist -Authorization Accepted'.
